body_html:
I thought so too. But the trick is that apk built by bazel (bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo) does not contain libtensorflow_inference.so either but only libtensorflow_demo.so in /lib. And its work fine on real device.
I would presume libtensorflow_demo.so include functionality of libtensorflow_inference.so.

I would presume libtensorflow_demo.so include functionality of libtensorflow_inference.so.
body:
I thought so too. But the trick is that apk built by bazel (`bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/examples/android:tensorflow_demo`) does not contain `libtensorflow_inference.so` either but only `libtensorflow_demo.so` in /lib. And its work fine on real device.
I would presume `libtensorflow_demo.so` include functionality of `libtensorflow_inference.so`.
